name: SupplierSoft
tag_list: supplier-relationship-management, supplier-contract-management, rohs, reach, environmental-regulations, environmental-compliance, environmental-management-system, saas, cloud-computing, procure-to-pay, supplier-quality-management, supplier-risk-management
overview:
Founded in 2008, SupplierSoft (www.suppliersoft.com), a pioneer in On-Demand Supplier Relationship Management (SRM) solutions, enables companies to automate any and all supplier-facing business processes.

Customers start with highest ROI processes, knowing that they can manage other processes in future with the platform. The solutions provide 360 degree visibility into supplier interactions across business functions such as purchasing, quality, compliance, engineering, manufacturing, and accounts payable. SupplierSoft complements and extends back-end ERP systems by managing supplier processes and information that is otherwise not tracked by these systems.

SupplierSoft solution suite includes Environmental Compliance (RoHS/REACH), Procure-To-Pay, Supplier Risk, Supplier Contracts, Supplier Quality, Supplier Audits and Supplier Qualification. Ease-of-use and global performance make supplier adoption high. The low-risk solutions deliver quick ROI through reduced operational costs and supplier risk, higher supplier compliance and improved supplier quality.

Suppliersoft customers include KLA-Tencor and Novatel Wireless.

In October 2009, SupplierSoft was recently named by ManagingAutomation.com in the list of â€œTop 10 Companies to Watch in 2010â€ (http://www.managingautomation.com/magread.aspx?content_id=251140)
